data.title: AGIS contracts Harvey Jones for comprehensive Microsoft BI
data.meta_description: AGIS, IT provider to AG Industries, a group of companies that fabricate value-added glass and aluminium products, components and finished products for wholesale distribution, has contracted Harvey Jones to replace its home-grown, proprietary business intelligence (BI) tool with a Microsoft-based, comprehensive BI system. The new system will use SQL Server 2005 and ProClarity with an
data.meta_site_name: IT News Africa | Business Technology, Telecoms and Startup News - Africa's Technology News Leader
data.text:
AGIS, IT provider to AG Industries, a group of companies that fabricate value-added glass and aluminium products, components

and finished products for wholesale distribution, has contracted Harvey Jones to replace its home-grown, proprietary business

intelligence (BI) tool with a Microsoft-based, comprehensive BI system.

The new system will use SQL Server 2005 and ProClarity with an upgrade path to PerformancePoint Server 2007 early next year, says Keith Jones, MD of Harvey Jones.

AGIS has undergone Harvey Jones BI Best Practice training in order to align all AG Industries business units before development of the new BI solution commences.

Microsoft acquired ProClarity in June 2006 and has subsequently integrated the productâ€™s advanced visualisation and analysis

technologies into its Office PerformancePoint Server 2007 alongside Business Scorecard Manager 2005.

Contact

Simone Hales, Harvey Jones, (011) 234-0947,

simoner@harveyjones.co.za
